jobDescription: Lead UI Developer for Roadguard's roadside tire safety system, architecting and developing the operator dashboard and data visualization platform that processes real-time camera and sensor streams from the roadside installations to detect worn or unsafe tires.

Designed and implemented comprehensive authentication and authorization systems using Keycloak, and BFF (Backend for Frontend) patterns, securing access to 10TB+ of sensitive tire detection data and operational controls.
Built video streaming infrastructure using Go2RTC and Caddy server for real-time camera feeds, enabling operators to monitor roadside installations and verify tire detection accuracy.

Developed ANPR (Automatic Number Plate Recognition) integration systems for vehicle identification and tracking, processing 1M+ license plate records daily to correlate with tire detection events and vehicle profiles.

Architected and maintained image processing pipelines for vehicle separation, tread depth analysis, and data curation, implementing containerized microservices with Docker and Kubernetes handling 500K+ images per day with 99.9% reliability.

Established CI/CD pipelines and operational monitoring using GitHub Actions, Azure Container Registry, and custom dashboards, ensuring 99.9% uptime for critical roadside safety infrastructure serving 10K+ daily API requests.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate machine vision outputs with backend decisioning systems, supporting Roadguard's nationwide rollout with Statens Vegvesen to reduce accidents by 15% and microplastic pollution by 30%.
Led the architecture of Bio-Me's microbiome profiling platform, increasing distributed pipeline throughput by 20% while reducing storage costs by 35%.
Directed the evolution of the laboratory information management system (LIMS), enabling 5 regulatory workflows and supporting +18 clinical customers.
Mentored and supervised internship programs, guiding a team of 4 students that shipped 16 production features.
Established comprehensive documentation standards and engineering best practices, improving release cycle efficiency by 12% and cutting onboarding time by 30%.
Partnered with leadership to define the platform roadmap, delivering 9 cross-functional initiatives on schedule.
Contributed to Bio-Me's microbiome profiling platform, helping implement distributed bioinformatics pipelines that improved processing efficiency by 200% and reduced storage costs by 31%.
Designed and optimized computational workflows for species-specific genomic region identification and qPCR assay development, enabling precise microbiome quantification.
Implemented scalable laboratory information management system (LIMS) features that tied analytical workflows to clinical and commercial requirements.
Developed automated testing suites and validation protocols that increased system reliability by 18%.

Responsible for engineering and implementing data analysis systems for infrastructure project monitoring, developing automated solutions for compliance tracking and quality assurance across multiple construction sites.

Architected comprehensive technical documentation systems and analytical frameworks for construction project oversight, improving operational efficiency and reducing documentation processing time by 25%.
Developed and maintained complex data processing pipelines for project metrics, including material testing, safety compliance, and environmental impact assessments.
Led the implementation of digital solutions for contract management and quality control, streamlining processes for construction specifications, material verification, and regulatory compliance.
Developed advanced instructional frameworks for computer architecture, data structures, and algorithms, achieving a 17% improvement in student performance metrics.
Designed and implemented hands-on programming workshops covering embedded systems, digital signal processing, and computational methods.
Created innovative problem-solving methodologies for complex engineering concepts, focusing on practical applications in C++, Python, and hardware design.
Engineered a scalable data collection system integrating Twitter's API with custom analytics pipelines, enabling real-time social media data processing for machine learning applications.
Developed robust ETL processes and data transformation workflows, implementing efficient storage solutions and data validation protocols.
